sentences.en: After computer printers and duffle bags had been carried to dorm rooms, everyone gathered in the gymnasium, students on one side of the bleachers, parents on the other.
sentences.cn: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

sentences.en: Babe's pointing to the bleachers replaced by the charm of a backpedaling shoulder shrug.
sentences.cn: 巴比对观众的颐指气使被乔丹无奈耸肩的魅力所取代.

sentences.en: I like to sit in the bleachers. You can see the game better.
sentences.cn: 汤姆:我愿意坐在露天看台上, 在那儿看比赛看得更清楚.

sentences.en: It's cheaper and most of the real baseball fans sit in the bleachers.
sentences.cn: 露天看台便宜,而且大多数真正的棒球球迷都坐在露天看台.

sentences.en: It's only in the bleachers where you have to sit in the sun.
sentences.cn: 只有在露天看台上才得坐在阳光下.

sentences.en: She took me to the bleachers in Fenway Park to watch Ted Williams play left field for the Boston Red Sox.
sentences.cn: 她载我到芬威公园的露天看台去看特德威廉姆斯在波斯顿红袜队打左路。

sentences.en: She's cheer captain and I'm on the bleachers.
sentences.cn: 她是啦啦队队长,我只是看台上的一员.

sentences.en: The bleachers were full to overflowing.

trans.tran_cn: <美>（运动场的）廉价座位，露天看台，漂白者，漂白剂，露天看台( bleacher的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: long wooden  bench es  arranged in rows, where you sit to watch sport
